name: Shopify Connector
description: Connects to the Shopify Admin API to manage shop data.

fields.name: store_url
fields.label: Shopify Store URL
fields.description: The full URL of your Shopify store (e.g., https://my-store.myshopify.com).

fields.name: access_token
fields.label: Shopify Admin API Access Token
fields.description: Your Shopify Admin API access token.

tools.name: getShopDetails
tools.description: Retrieves details about the Shopify store.

tools.name: getProducts
tools.description: Retrieves a paginated list of products.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: The number of products to return (default: 10, max: 250).

arguments.name: page_info
arguments.description: The page info for the next page of results.

tools.name: getProduct
tools.description: Retrieves a single product by its ID.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the product to retrieve.

tools.name: getOrders
tools.description: Retrieves a paginated list of orders.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: The number of orders to return (default: 10, max: 250).

arguments.name: page_info
arguments.description: The page info for the next page of results.

tools.name: getOrder
tools.description: Retrieves a single order by its ID.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the order to retrieve.

tools.name: get
tools.description: Makes a generic GET request to the Shopify Admin API.

tools.name: graphql
tools.description: Makes a generic GraphQL request to the Shopify Admin API.

arguments.name: variables
arguments.description: The variables for the GraphQL query.
